Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Park Otaru in Otaru, you'll be minutes from Ishihara Yujiro Memorial Museum and close to Otaru Tenguyama Ropeway. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Nishin Goten and Kokusai Ski Resort.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 296 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Grand Park Otaru in Otaru, you'll be minutes from Ishihara Yujiro Memorial Museum and close to Otaru Tenguyama Ropeway. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Nishin Goten and Kokusai Ski Resort.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ishihara Yujiro Memorial Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Otaru Tenguyama Ropeway - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Nishin Goten - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Kokusai Ski Resort - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Yoichi Wine Brewery - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi
Yoichi Space Dome - 19.1 km / 11.8 mi
Yoichi Marina - 19.1 km / 11.8 mi
Shiroi Koibito Park - 22.7 km / 14.1 mi
Mt. Okura Ski Jump Stadium - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi
Sapporo Winter Sports Museum - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi
Hokkaido Shrine - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi
Sapporo Racecourse - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi
Maruyama Park - 27.3 km / 17 mi
Maruyama Zoo - 27.5 km / 17.1 mi
Hokkaido University - 28.3 km / 17.6 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Park Otaru is Sapporo (CTS-New Chitose) - 69.3 km / 43.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
